statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data;
SELECT building_id, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT building_id, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY building_id;
SELECT building_id, waste_type, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, disposal_location ASC
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY waste_type ORDER BY waste_count DESC
SELECT building_id, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND disposal_method = 'Recycling'
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT building_id, disposal_method, compliance_status FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%Landfill%' ORDER BY building_id ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data
SELECT id, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE building_id = 10 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT building_id, waste_type, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY building_id ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01' AND disposal_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, disposal_method, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY disposal_method, disposal_date DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE building_id = 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_disposals > 5;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, waste_type;
SELECT DISTINCT disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY disposal_method ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE id = 'a651b7c9-aa10-4a38-b282-c769d6048a2e';
SELECT building_id, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT id, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingDetails WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM Regulations;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData;
SELECT id, building_id, waste_type, disposal_date FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT building_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM BuildingDetails WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_description LIKE '%hazardous%';
SELECT building_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteDisposalData GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location, waste_accepted, capacity FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM waste_facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_accepted LIKE '%Plastic%';
SELECT facility_id, location FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_accepted='Hazardous';
SELECT disposal_date, waste_weight FROM waste_logs WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, waste_accepted, capacity FROM waste_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_regulations WHERE description LIKE '%environmental%';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal;
SELECT building_id, building_name, city, state, zip_code FROM building ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, disposed_by FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill';
SELECT * FROM disposal_log WHERE disposed_location LIKE '%Recycling%';
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM disposal_personnel WHERE personnel_role IN ('Manager', 'Supervisor');
SELECT disposal_id, disposed_by, disposal_type FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM building WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, disposed_date_time, disposed_location FROM disposal_log WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM disposal_personnel WHERE personnel_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY personnel_name DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposed_amount, disposal_type FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill' AND disposed_amount > 500 ORDER BY disposal_id ASC;
